channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: S&P 500 Falls While Oil Extends Rally
item.description: Major U.S. markets fell, with the tech-focused Nasdaq leading losses as new export curbs weighed on Nvidia and other chip stocks.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Extend Gains on Weather Outlook

item.title: The 30-year yield is on the cusp of 5% as next big U.S. inflation update looms
item.description: Yields on long-dated U.S. government debt remained near their highest levels in over a year on Monday, ahead of the midweek release of the December co...

item.title: Brent crude jumps above $80 a barrel as investors weigh U.S. sanctions on Russian oil
item.description: Oil futures were up strongly Monday, with Brent crude on track for its first finish above $80 a barrel since August, as investors assess the potential...

item.title: There goes 80% of the market, says one reaction to new White House microchip rules
item.description: The White House on Monday announced new restrictions on artificial intelligence exports that will impact companies including Nvidia.

item.title: China and the U.K. have the opposite problem. They just struck a deal.

item.title: Goldman Sees Financing as the Future. It Is Rearranging Itself to Reflect That.
item.description: The Wall Street giant’s new group will capitalize on a private-credit surge and anticipated private-equity deal boom.

item.title: Euro Could Fall Further in Short Term Due to Trump Policies, Fed Outlook

item.title: Gold's Near-Term Outlook Threatened by Rising Bond Yields, StoneX Says

item.title: ‘How can you fit your life in a car?’ As the Pacific Palisades wildfire rages, Malibu business owners face grim new realities.
item.description: When your neighborhood is destroyed by fire, what do you take with you? And how do you face the future?
